column5: Ranger520vx, I was looking at the gallery and notice your pictures from rice. Nice looking photos, any story behind that? I was there fishing on the weekend and the bit was slow and light. The smallmouth bass were biting on tubes. There was also a small combo tourney. Winning weight was just under 20 lbs for the day. They were all walleyes. The big fish of the day was a walleye at 7.75 lbs.
